website_summaries.verdict: The HP X7000 Wi-Fi Touch Mouse frees up USB ports by pairing through a wireless adapter, but its hypersensitive touch dial and accident-prone design make it frustrating to use.
pros: The lightweight, ergonomic HP X7000 Wi-Fi Touch Mouse transmits a pairing signal through a wireless network to liberate precious USB ports for other peripherals
cons: The X7000's ergonomic shape alienates left-handed users, the oversensitive touch scroll pad doesn't compare to the tactility of a classic scroll wheel, and the driver software lacks tools to reroute the functions of the mouse buttons

product_meta.title: HP X7000 Touch Mouse with Wi-Fi
product_meta.description:
Combine connectivity, productivity and convenience using the HP X7000 Touch Mouse with Wi-Fi.® Connect this HP wireless mouse to your PC without using a USB receiver, so you can free up ports for other devices. Just make sure your computer has a Windows® 7 operating system and a Windows 7 logo certified Wi-Fi network adapter. Move your cursor quickly and effortlessly with the flick of a finger using touch scrolling. The sleek design is comfortable to use and has a secure rubber side grip. With a dedicated button for Facebook, you can also connect to the social networking site in one click. Upload new photos and update your status fast. Plus, save time by creating shortcuts with the 6-button design of this wireless mouse. The laser sensor works on most surfaces, making this mouse ideal for your home, office and on the go. Keep this HP wireless mouse powered with a battery life of up to 9 months.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER

Count on the HP X7000 Touch Mouse with Wi-Fi for touch scrolling and clicking without wires or a USB adapter. This wireless mouse connects easily to computers with a Genuine Windows 7 operating system and built-in Wi-Fi. It also has a dedicated Facebook button that connects to the social networking site fast. The laser sensor works on most surfaces, plus you can create shortcuts using six buttons.


IDEAL FOR



Touch scrolling with total freedom. The HP X7000 Touch Mouse with Wi-Fi works without a USB adapter, so you can free up your computer’s USB ports for other devices. Just make sure your laptop or desktop has Genuine Windows 7 and built-in Wi-Fi. Scroll up, down, left and right with the flick of a finger. This wireless mouse has a sleek, comfortable design with a secure rubber side grip. Plus, upload photos and videos to Facebook using the dedicated button.
